rella.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • rella.shapes.Shape
      • rella.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    Author:
    drella543

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a new Rectangle at (0, 0) with width 0 and height 0
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges at x and x + width and top and bottom at y and y + height
